entry.title: Kenyan Chai Black Tea-1KG
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 140.00

 ‘Chai’ actually just means ‘tea’, but here in the west, we have adopted the term to mean spiced tea. Our Kenyan Chai is spiced with a unique bouquet of cloves, cinnamon, fennel and rose petals. Totally different from a spicy Indian Masala Chai, this has been known to make chai devotees rethink how they drink their chai! Also delicious as an iced tea!

Non GMO, Rain Forest Certified and Fair Trade Certified.

Tasting Notes: Sweet and Spicy 

Steeping Instructions: 1 teaspoon per 8 ounces water – 205°F – 3 mins

Natural Ingredients: Rainforest Alliance Kenyan Black tea, allspice, clove, fennel, cinnamon, licorice root, ginger, black pepper, rose petals.

Caffeine: Medium

entry.title: Creme Earl Grey Black-1KG
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 126.00


Our flavory Earl Grey mellowed with a delicious creamy taste. Enjoy anytime of day. 

Grand River Tea number one top favourite.

This tea makes delicious Earl Grey Shortbread cookies!

Earl Grey Shortbread Cookies

Ingredients 

2 cups all purpose flour

2 tablespoons Grand River Tea Earl Grey Crème tea leaves

½ teaspoon salt

¾ cup confectioners’ sugar

1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract

1 cup butter room temperature

 

Directions

In a food processor, pulse together the flour, tea and salt until the tea is just spotted throughout the flour.

Add the confectioners sugar, vanilla, and butter. Pulse together just until a dough is formed.

Place dough on a sheet of plastic wrap and roll into a log about 2 ½ inches in diameter. Tightly twist each end of wrap and chill in refrigerator for 30 minutes.

Preheat oven to 375 degrees F 

Slice the log into 1/3 inch thick disks. Place on parchment lined baking sheets 2 inches apart. 

Bake until the edges are just brown about 12 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes then transfer to wire racks and cool to room temperature. 

Enjoy!!!!!

Ingredients: Black tea, Cornflower petals, Natural flavours 

Grown: Sri Lanka

Steeping Instructions: 1 teaspoon per 8 ounces water – 205°F – 3 mins

Caffeine: Medium

entry.title: Masala Chai Black- 25 Pyramids
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 16.00

Full bodied tea enhances South Indian masala spices. The finish has cardamom notes peeking out from lively ginger. Superb with milk and sugar.
Luxury Ingredients: Black tea, Ginger, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Black + White pepper, Clove, Nutmeg. 

Grown: India / Kenya / Thailand

Caffeine Content: Medium

entry.title: Roses and Chocolate Black-40G-GRT NEW BLEND
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 9.00

Delicate rose petals and rich cacao from Habitual Chocolate in Woodstock, is a great compliment to our Kenyan grown black tea.  Add a bit of honey or choice of sweetener for an indulgent cup of black of tea.  Brew this one a little longer approximate 4-5 minutes to extract all the rose and chocolate aroma and flavours.

Cacao we've used in this blend is from our friends at Habitual Chocolate in Woodstock, Ontario.  They roast the cacao beans in house.

Ingredients: Kenyan Black Tea, Organic Cacao Nibs/Husks and Organic Rose Petals.

Grown: Kenya, India, Dominican Republic, (Husks-Equador, Peru, Mexico, Honduras and Columbia) 

Brew 1 heaping teaspoon in 8 ounces of water 205F for 4-5 minutes

entry.title: Autumn Spice Premium Black-50G-New Grand River Tea Blend-Limited Quantity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 10.00

This is a must have tea for fall.  We've pulled out our very best Kenyan black tea to blend this beautiful hug in a mug.  It's a beautiful long leaf black tea that is smooth, and malty.  We've added  premium autumn spice blend of cinnamon, cloves, ginger and nutmeg.  

There is nothing artificial about this blend.  100% Natural no sugar, sweetener, artificial flavours, oils or natural flavours added.  

Shake your bag to make sure you get all those lovely spices in each and every cup.

Contains caffeine   Vegan  Gluten Free

Beautiful tea to enjoy during those cool autumn days!

Premium Ingredients: Kenyan Black Tea (Two Leaves and a bud), Cinnamon, Ginger, Cloves and Nutmeg

Brew 3-4 Minutes 1 tsp 205 deg F

entry.title: Masala Chai Matcha Black-40G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 16.50

Are you a chai lover?  This takes it up to the next level for health benefits.  
Our Masala Chai Matcha makes a perfect latte.  Just add 1/2 teaspoon to just boiled water and whisk then top up with your favourite frothy milk and spices to top.
Chai latte heaven!!
Luxury Ingredients: Black tea, Ginger, Cinnamon, Cardamom, Black + White pepper, Clove, Nutmeg. 
Grown: India and Kenya

Stainless steel 18/8

entry.title: Grosche Laval Tea Infuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grosche
Type: Accessory
Price: 12.00

The GROSCHE LAVAL loose tea infuser is perfect for any cup, mug, or small teapot. The LAVAL is suitable for all loose leaf teas and won’t allow leaves to seep into your tea. It is made from 18-8 stainless steel and can hold enough loose leaf tea for 2-3 steeps. It is easily removable with the lip of the infuser.

Your purchase of this product, GROSCHE is able to provide 50+ days of safe drinking water to someone in need.

entry.title: Grand River Breakfast Black-50g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 9.00

One of our customers favourite breakfast black tea. This rich black tea is fresh and smooth, but packs a serious hit of flavour. Sweet and complex on its own, but equally superb with a splash of milk and sugar. Also delicious as an iced tea!

Luxury Ingredients: Black Tea (Non GMO, Pesticide Free, Fair Trade Member, Rainforest Alliance Certified)

Caffeine: High

Grown: Kenya, South Africa

Brew: 3-4 Minutes 1 tsp. 205 Deg F

entry.title: Organic Lapsang Souchong Black-25g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Black Tea
Price: 10.00

Smooth and crisp with an aroma of pine and oak wood fire.

Wonderful to enjoy with your BBQ or when you're indulging in a dark chocolate. 

Grind up this tea and add it to your next recipe when you need a hint of smoke.  

It makes a great rub for meat or ground into burgers.

But remember it's a delicious tea to drink.

Ingredients: Organic Black Tea

Grown: China

Steeping Instructions: 1 teaspoon per 8 ounces water – 205°F – 3 mins

Caffeine: Medium
